pages.title: Ice Shards
pages.text: Crystalline shards dropped by Frozen Coal Ore, which forms on the surface starting in Phase 4.$(br2)Ice shards are a key crafting material for packed ice, blue ice, and the Frozen Heart. Mine frozen coal ore to collect them.$(br2)$(italic)Your coal has become ice. The fuel you need to stay warm has frozen into the opposite of warmth. The universe has a sense of humor. ORSA does not find it funny.$()
